body.name: High-Grade 100% Bamboo Knife Drawer Organizer - 16 Knife Slots Plus a Sharpener Slot, Knife Organizer for Kitchen Organization, Durable, Secured, Practical, Eco-Friendly, Knife Block without Knives.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 6 mins
features: KNIFE DRAWER ORGANIZER - Keep your drawer organized by storing 16 cooking and cutting knives plus your sharpener in a tidy and easily accessible manner. The organizer holds most standard knives and fits in most drawers.

SPACE SAVER - The knife block set is innovatively designed to hold double the number of knives while fitting knives of various sizes. Longer and thicker knives are stored between each slot, maximizing the space.
UPGRATED SLOTS - The slots are curved so you can effortlessly retrieve your knives. Knives won’t shoot up even if a drawer is slammed closed, maintaining your safety and peace of mind.
MODERN BAMBOO - Crafted of a 100% authentic bamboo with a smooth finish, the knives set organizer is supremely durable, eco-friendly, and adds a modern, aesthetic touch to your drawer.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN - No tools are required to set the organizer up for kitchen use. It is ready for kitchen use straight out the packaging! Please note: The organizer is not dishwasher safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Instant Setup 2 Curved Slots 3 Safety First 4 Stays in Place 5 Strikingly Modern

Transform your kitchen with Ruboxa's bamboo knife organizer! Ruboxa's bamboo knife drawer organizer is not just a functional tool but also a statement piece that will enhance the aesthetics of your kitchen. Its natural, sleek look combined with its sturdiness and safety features make it an essential addition to any kitchen. Don't settle for a cluttered and disorganized drawer - order yours now and transform your cooking experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Kitchen Organization and Eco-Friendly Design!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The High-Grade 100% Bamboo Knife Drawer Organizer is a game-changer for kitchen organization. Crafted from eco-friendly bamboo, this organizer not only adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen drawers but also promotes sustainability. With 16 knife slots plus a sharpener slot, it provides ample space to store and organize my knives of various sizes. The durable construction ensures that my knives are securely held in place, preventing any accidents or damage. I appreciate the practicality of this organizer, as it keeps my knives easily accessible while also protecting them from dulling or scratching. Additionally, the sleek design adds a modern touch to my kitchen decor. If you’re looking for a durable, practical, and eco-friendly solution to streamline your kitchen organization, look no further than the High-Grade Bamboo Knife Drawer Organizer. It’s a must-have for any home chef!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits all my knives
reviews.reviewText: Omg, I love this knife holder. It fits all my knives. I am finally able to get rid of the block holder! I have been wanting to chuck that thing for so long now! But can never find something that fits in my drawer, not move around when we open and close the drawer, fits all of my knives and looks nice! People were really impressed when they opened the knife drawer. Looks so organized and clean! Now my counter is less cluttered! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Design With Great Functionality
reviews.reviewText: It fit perfectly in my drawer and is a solid piece with good weight to it. I am using it to store my kitchen knives as well as my steak knives. Easy to grab the handle of whichever knife you need without the worry of accidently cutting yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a variety of knives + some from the Asian supermarkets with the wooden handles. I wasn't sure if this would fit them, but it did and perfectly. The one downside is that if you have a huge meat cleaver knife it obviously won't fit. But its well made and I love being able to clearly see my knives and the safety aspect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: FYI it comes with a knife sharpener holder no a knife sharpener

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more knife block!!!
reviews.reviewText: If you dream of removing the knife block from your countertops, this will work for you. It should fit in a small drawer, although we put it in a wide drawer. It fits all of the knives perfectly (shown in the picture, two knives were taken out to show empty spaces). If you need 8 steak knife slots, they do sell a different version. However, I worry about the functionality of that one due to its same dimensions. You might need to read some reviews. This is the best thing I’ve done for my kitchen (and sanity) in a while!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy organization and safe
reviews.reviewText: This bamboo tray was the perfect organizer for the 18 knives that came in my knife block + the sharpener. Not only does this help free up much needed counter space, it also makes it safer to grab a knife without playing the “which knife is where” in the knife block. Large knives on the bottom tier, steak knives on the top tier… perfection! AND much cleaner than having the knife block on the counter getting dusty and cooking grease splattered all over it.
